headline: Charter Communications, Inc. (CHTR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Charter Communications, Inc. on r/Valueinvesting by ninjagorilla. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CHTR. Charter Communications, Inc.’s share was trading at $239.09 as of February 13th. CHTR’s trailing and forward P/E were 6.60 and 5.50, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Charter Communications (CHTR) presents a compelling investment opportunity […]
